=== Bibek Paudel ===

I love programming, system administration and the philosophy/beauty of computing. I love talking and sharing ideas about them with other interested people even more.

My non-professional hobbies include photography, writing, study of history and culture, travel/trekking and drinking :)

==== Who Am I ====
* Student of Computer Science and Engineering
* Advocate of Free and Open Source Softwares and Open Standards
* Part timer of everything else.
